::: panel-tabset
## Data Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
#| code-fold: show

library(dplyr)
library(scda)
library(rlistings)

adex <- synthetic_cdisc_dataset("rcd_2022_10_13", "adex")

out <- adex %>%
  filter(PARAMCD == "DOSE" & !is.na(AVAL) & SAFFL == "Y") %>%
  mutate(
    CRTNPT = paste(SITEID, SUBJID, sep = "/")
  ) %>%
  arrange(CRTNPT, AVISIT) %>%
  select(CRTNPT, AVISIT, EXSTDY, EXENDY, TRT01A, AVAL, AVALU, EXDOSFRQ, EXROUTE)

var_labels(out) <- c(
  CRTNPT = "Center/Subject ID",
  AVISIT = "Visit",
  EXSTDY = "Study Day\nFrom",
  EXENDY = "Study Day\nTo",
  TRT01A = "Treatment",
  AVAL = "Dose",
  AVALU = "Unit",
  EXDOSFRQ = "Frequency",
  EXROUTE = "Route"
)
```

## Standard Listing

```{r}
lsting <- as_listing(
  out,
  key_cols = c("CRTNPT", "AVISIT"),
  disp_cols = names(out),
  main_title = "Listing of Exposure to Study Drug"
)

head(lsting, 20)
```
:::
